// src/game-logic/deck.js
const SUITS=['s','h','d','c'];const RANKS=['2','3','4','5','6','7','8','9','T','J','Q','K','A'];export function getShuffledDeck(){const deck=[];for(const suit of SUITS){for(const rank of RANKS){deck.push(rank+suit);}}for(let i=deck.length-1;i>0;i--){const j=Math.floor(Math.random()*(i+1));[deck[i],deck[j]]=[deck[j],deck[i]];}return deck;}export function dealHands(deck){const hands=[[],[],[],[]];for(let i=0;i<13;i++){for(let j=0;j<4;j++){hands[j].push(deck[i*4+j]);}}return hands;}
